programme.title: Battledogs
programme.desc: All of Manhattan is quarantined when a strange virus turns innocent civilians into ravenous wolves.

programme.desc: A demonic racecar driver returns from the dead to seek revenge against a former rival.

programme.desc: A secret admirer's crush on a high school athlete takes a fatal turn in this tense thriller.

programme.desc: College students learn to regret their decision to sign up as test subjects for a new drug.

programme.desc: A mysterious virus turns animals at a safari park into bloodthirsty zombies.

programme.desc: Scream along to horror classics like GINGER SNAPS, DAY OF THE DEAD and DRACULA, and witness weird supernatural tales starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Sydney Sweeney, Dan Stevens and other stars.
